verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H702>yes,<s%> for four, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> its <S%H8313>punishment;<s%> because he burned the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> into <S%H7875>lime;<s%>

but I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and it will <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H7152>Kerioth;<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab<s%> will <S%H4191>die<s%> with <S%H7588>tumult,<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting,<s%> and with the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet;<s%>
and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H8199>judge<s%> from their <S%H7130>midst,<s%> and will <S%H2026>kill<s%> all its <S%H8269>princes<s%> with <S%H559>him,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H702>yes,<s%> for four, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> its <S%H3988>punishment;<s%> because they have rejected <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H8451>law,<s%> and have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and their <S%H3577>lies<s%> have led them <S%H8582>astray,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> which their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H1980>walked;<s%>
But I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and it will <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H702>yes,<s%> for four, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> its <S%H4376>punishment;<s%> because they have sold the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> for <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H34>needy<s%> for a pair of <S%H5275>shoes;<s%>

They <S%H7602>trample<s%> on the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> and <S%H5186>deny<s%> <S%H1870>justice<s%> to the <S%H6035>oppressed;<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3212>use<s%> the same <S%H5291>maiden,<s%> to <S%H2490>profane<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name;<s%>

and they lay themselves <S%H5186>down<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> every <S%H4196>altar<s%> on <S%H899>clothes<s%> taken in <S%H2254>pledge;<s%> and in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H430>God<s%> they <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of those who have been <S%H6064>fined.<s%>

Yet I <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1363>them,<s%> whose height was like the <S%H1363>height<s%> of the <S%H730>cedars,<s%> and he was <S%H2634>strong<s%> as the <S%H437>oaks;<s%> yet I <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> from <S%H4605>above,<s%> and his roots from <S%H8328>beneath.<s%>

Also I brought you <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3212>led<s%> you <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorite.<s%>

I raised <S%H6965>up<s%> some of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> for <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and some of your young <S%H970>men<s%> for <S%H5139>Nazirites.<s%> <S%H1121>Isn't<s%> this true, you children of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
"But you gave the <S%H5139>Nazirites<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> to <S%H8248>drink,<s%> and <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5012><s%> 'Don't prophesy!'
<S%H5781>Behold,<s%> I will crush you in your <S%H5699>place,<s%> as a cart <S%H5781>crushes<s%> that is <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5995>grain.<s%>

<S%H4498>Flight<s%> will <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H7031>swift;<s%> and the <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H553>won't<s%> strengthen his <S%H3581>force;<s%> neither shall the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H4422>deliver<s%> <S%H5315>himself;<s%>

neither shall he <S%H5975>stand<s%> who <S%H8610>handles<s%> the <S%H7198>bow;<s%> and he who is <S%H7031>swift<s%> of <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H4422>won't<s%> escape; neither shall he who <S%H7392>rides<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H4422>deliver<s%> <S%H5315>himself;<s%>
and he who is <S%H533>courageous<s%> among the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> will flee <S%H5127>away<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
